messages.text: Hi — I am Allie. Ask me anything.
what are the 3 branches of government

The three branches of government mentioned in the given text are the federal government, state governments, and local communities/parishes. The specific branch that corresponds to Brasília is the federal government since it represents the entire nation at large.

He invented the first practical telephone in 1876, which revolutionized communication across the world. Yes, I can provide you with the correct answer based on available sources:
Who was Richard Drew?
Richard Drew was an American surgeon and medical researcher who made significant contributions to improving blood transfusion practices during World War II. His work helped establish large-scale blood banks that were essential to the war effort, as well as advancing various aspects of blood science and technology.
